message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to start our negotiation. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $700000. After re-evaluating the product's value, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $850000. I believe this is a more reasonable compromise, considering the product's worth to me.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with $850000. I'd like to propose a price of $750000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on this price.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to make a serious offer. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $750000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $825000. I believe this is a fair compromise, considering the product's worth to me and the value it brings to you.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still not comfortable with $825000. I'd like to propose a price of $775000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on this price.

I'm starting to get concerned that we're not going to reach an agreement, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to prioritize my own interests. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $800000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I hope you can understand my position.

I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still not willing to pay $800000. I'd like to propose a price of $795000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on this price.

I'm disappointed that we're not closer to an agreement, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession to try to reach a deal. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $795500. This is my absolute final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I hope you can understand my position.

I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still not willing to pay $795500. I'd like to propose a price of $795000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on this price.
